trans-unit.source: Provides schema compilation options for the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref> class This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce opzioni di compilazione dello schema per il <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"> </xref> classe questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: The XmlSchemaCompilationSettings class provides schema compilation options for the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> class.
trans-unit.target: La classe XmlSchemaCompilationSettings fornisce opzioni di compilazione dello schema per la <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>classe.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCompilationSettings.EnableUpaCheck%2A> property specifies that the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> should check for Unique Particle Attribution (UPA) violations when schemas in the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> are compiled.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, il <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCompilationSettings.EnableUpaCheck%2A>proprietà specifica che il <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>deve ricercare le violazioni di attribuzione di particelle univoche (UPA) quando gli schemi nel <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>vengono compilati.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCompilationSettings.EnableUpaCheck%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCompilationSettings"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCompilationSettings"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref> should check for Unique Particle Attribution (UPA) violations.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"> </xref> deve ricercare le violazioni di attribuzione di particelle univoche (UPA).

trans-unit.source: When the EnableUpaCheck property is set to `false`, validation will be performed based on the following rules.
trans-unit.target: Quando è impostata la proprietà EnableUpaCheck `false`, la convalida verrà eseguita in base alle regole seguenti.

trans-unit.source: If there is a choice between a strong type and a wildcard, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> will pick the strongly typed particle as illustrated in the following schema and Xml examples.
trans-unit.target: Se è possibile scegliere tra un tipo sicuro e un carattere jolly, il <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>sceglierà la particella fortemente tipizzata come illustrato di esempi di Xml schema seguente.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>

trans-unit.source: `<xs:sequence>` `<xs:any namespace="##any"/>` `<xs:element name="A" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/>` `</xs:sequence>` In the following Xml, the `A` element will be associated with `<xs:element name="A" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/>` in the schema.
trans-unit.target: `<xs:sequence>` `<xs:any namespace="##any"/>` `<xs:element name="A" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/>` `</xs:sequence>`Il codice XML seguente, il `A` elemento verrà associato `<xs:element name="A" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/>` nello schema.

trans-unit.source: If there is a choice between two strongly typed elements, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> will pick the first one.
trans-unit.target: Se è possibile scegliere tra due elementi fortemente tipizzati, il <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>sceglierà il primo.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>

trans-unit.source: `<xs:sequence>` `<xs:element name="A" type="xs:string"/>` `<xs:element name="B" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/>` `<xs:element name="B" type="xs:string"/>` `</xs:sequence>` In the following Xml, the `B` element will be associated with `<xs:element name="B" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/>` in the schema.
trans-unit.target: `<xs:sequence>` `<xs:element name="A" type="xs:string"/>` `<xs:element name="B" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/>` `<xs:element name="B" type="xs:string"/>` `</xs:sequence>`Il codice XML seguente, il `B` elemento verrà associato `<xs:element name="B" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/>` nello schema.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref> should check for Unique Particle Attribution (UPA) violations; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"> </xref> deve ricercare le violazioni di attribuzione di particelle univoche (UPA); in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.
